meanings.definition: Relating to or using a combination of turbo and electric power.
meanings.sent1: The turboelectric car zoomed down the road with its powerful engine.
meanings.sent2: The new train model featured a turboelectric engine for faster travel.
meanings.sent3: The turboelectric blender made smoothies so fast, it was like magic!
meanings.sent4: Her turboelectric personality lit up the room with energy and excitement.
meanings.sent5: The turboelectric storm raged through the night, lighting up the sky with electric power.

meanings.definition: A device or system that combines turbo and electric power.
meanings.sent1: The turboelectric in the factory increased production efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The futuristic car boasted a cutting-edge turboelectric system.
meanings.sent3: The turboelectric hum of the machine was oddly soothing to the workers.
meanings.sent4: The turboelectric of the spaceship propelled it into outer space with ease.
meanings.sent5: The turboelectric at the power plant provided a reliable source of energy for the city.
